movies.Title: Avatar

movies.Title: The Breakfast Club
movies.Plot: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a great deal more in common than they thought.

movies.Title: John Wick
movies.Plot: An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters who killed his dog and stole his car.

movies.Title: The Pursuit of Happiness
movies.Plot: A young college student is sent to prison as much for killing a pedestrian with his car as for not paying his parking tickets. When the opportunity presents itself he escapes and is subsequently on the run with his girlfriend. But...

movies.Title: The Avengers
movies.Plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

movies.Title: Moana
movies.Plot: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

movies.Title: Encanto

movies.Title: Coco
movies.Plot: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

movies.Title: Snow White
movies.Plot: The ageless tale of a beautiful young princess whose jealous stepmother orders her killed so that she will be 'the fairest in the land.' When the huntsman takes pity on her, he takes her to the house of the seven dwarfs.
movies.Actors: Diana Rigg, Billy Barty, Sarah Patterson

movies.Title: It
movies.Plot: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.

movies.Title: Halloween
movies.Plot: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.
